object.text: Select the secondary ROM to manage
Force using generic screen drawing code
Press and hold volume up or down
during boot to enter MultiROM menu.
MultiROM will remember the last ROM
you've booted and auto-boot it on next
reboot, unless you select different one.
Press and hold volume up or down
during boot to enter MultiROM menu.
